header_text: You invited your spouse to hang out with you and your friends so that everyone could get to know each other. As it got later, your spouse brought up a controversial topic, and your friends seemed unsure about how to respond. You know that your friends recognize that many people, including you and your spouse, have different opinions.

elements.Text: Will your friends judge you because of your spouse?
